title: Default Rewrite Rules
description: Comprehensive set of rewrite rules to remove remaster and special edition information from track and album names

rules.name: Remove Year Digital Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2004 Digital Remaster'
examples: The Big Ship - 2004 Digital Remaster → The Big Ship
Bitter Sweet Symphony - 2004 Digital Remaster → Bitter Sweet Symphony

rules.name: Remove Year Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2016 Remaster'
examples: Blitzkrieg Bop - 2016 Remaster → Blitzkrieg Bop

rules.name: Remove Remastered Year
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Remastered 2000'
examples: He's So Fine - Remastered 2000 → He's So Fine
Express Yourself - Remastered 2000 → Express Yourself

rules.name: Remove Year Remastered Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2008 Remastered Version'
examples: Do Wah Diddy Diddy - 2007 Remastered Version → Do Wah Diddy Diddy
The Air That I Breathe - 2008 Remastered Version → The Air That I Breathe

rules.name: Remove Remastered Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Remastered Version'
examples: Mighty Tight Woman - Remastered Version → Mighty Tight Woman
Big Road - Remastered Version → Big Road

rules.name: Remove Plain Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Remastered'
examples: Such Great Heights - Remastered → Such Great Heights
Virtual Insanity - Remastered → Virtual Insanity

rules.name: Remove Digitally Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Digitally Remastered'
examples: Skating In Central Park - Digitally Remastered → Skating In Central Park
Steps-What Was - Digitally Remastered → Steps-What Was

rules.name: Remove Remastered LP Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2007 Remastered LP Version' or 'Song - Remastered LP Version'
examples: Handle With Care - 2007 Remastered LP Version → Handle With Care
They Reminisce Over You - Remastered LP Version → They Reminisce Over You

rules.name: Remove Digital Remaster Variations
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Digital Remaster 00'
examples: Express Yourself - Digital Remaster 00 → Express Yourself

rules.name: Remove Rudy Van Gelder Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns with Rudy Van Gelder remaster information
examples: Bags' Groove - Rudy Van Gelder 2001 - Remaster → Bags' Groove
Inner Urge - Rudy Van Gelder Edition;2003 Digital Remaster → Inner Urge

rules.name: Remove Remastered Album Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Remastered Album Version'
examples: Track Name - Remastered Album Version → Track Name

rules.name: Remove Remastered Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2004 Remastered Edition'
examples: Dreams - 2004 Remastered Edition → Dreams
The Chain - 2004 Remastered Edition → The Chain

rules.name: Remove Year - Remaster Format
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2000 - Remaster'
examples: The Beach Boys - Wouldn't it Be Nice - 1999 - Remaster → Wouldn't it Be Nice
Billy Idol - Eyes Without A Face - 1999 - Remaster → Eyes Without A Face

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song (Remastered)'
examples: Orion (Remastered) → Orion
Enter Sandman (Remastered) → Enter Sandman

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Year Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song (2018 Remaster)'
examples: Lazy Sunday (Mono Version) (2018 Remaster) → Lazy Sunday (Mono Version)
My Sweet Lord (2000) (2014 Remaster) → My Sweet Lord (2000)

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Re-Recorded
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song (Re-Recorded / Remastered)' or 'Song (Re-Recorded)'
examples: Stand By Me (Re-Recorded / Remastered) → Stand By Me
Build Me Up Buttercup (Re-Recorded) → Build Me Up Buttercup

rules.name: Remove Bracketed Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song [Remastered Version]' or 'Song [2023 Remaster]'
examples: Mighty Tight Woman [Remastered Version] → Mighty Tight Woman
Search and Destroy [2023 Remaster] → Search and Destroy

rules.name: Remove 24-Bit Digitally Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 24-Bit Digitally Remastered'
examples: White Wedding - Parts 1 And 2 - 24-Bit Digitally Remastered 01 → White Wedding - Parts 1 And 2
Mack The Knife - 24-Bit Digitally Remastered → Mack The Knife

rules.name: Remove Complex Punctuation Patterns
rules.description: Removes patterns with semicolons and complex formatting
examples: I Ain't Tha 1 - Edited;2000 Digital Remaster → I Ain't Tha 1
Un Poco Loco - 1998 Digital Remaster;The Rudy Van Gelder Edition → Un Poco Loco

rules.name: Remove Complex Slash Patterns
rules.description: Removes patterns with slashes like 'Song - Pt. 1 / Remastered/2019'
examples: Precious Lord - Pt. 1 / Remastered/2019 → Precious Lord
White Wedding - Pt. 1 / Remastered 2002 → White Wedding

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Year Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (2014 Remastered)' or 'Album (2018 Remaster Version)'
examples: All Things Must Pass (2014 Remastered) → All Things Must Pass
Small Faces (2018 Remaster) → Small Faces

rules.name: Remove Deluxe Remastered Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Deluxe Remastered Edition)' or 'Album (Deluxe Edition Remastered)'
examples: Idlewild South (Deluxe Edition Remastered) → Idlewild South
Ready To Die (The Remaster) → Ready To Die

rules.name: Remove Expanded & Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Expanded & Remastered Original Album Mix)'
examples: Red (Expanded & Remastered Original Album Mix) → Red
Larks' Tongues In Aspic (Expanded & Remastered Original Album Mix) → Larks' Tongues In Aspic

rules.name: Remove Remaster Edition Text
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Remaster)' or 'Album (2006 Remastered Version)'
examples: Paranoid (Remaster) → Paranoid
Pink Flag (2006 Remastered Version) → Pink Flag

rules.name: Remove Bracketed Remaster Info
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [RVG Remaster]' or 'Album [Original Jazz Classics Remasters]'
examples: We Three [RVG Remaster] → We Three
Waltz For Debby [Original Jazz Classics Remasters] → Waltz For Debby

rules.name: Remove HD Digital Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album - HD Digital Remastered 2009'
examples: Time Out - HD Digital Remastered 2009 → Time Out

rules.name: Remove Anniversary Remaster Editions
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition; 2016 Remaster)'
examples: Ramones (40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition; 2016 Remaster) → Ramones

rules.name: Remove CTI Anniversary Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (CTI Records 40th Anniversary Edition - Original recording remastered)'
examples: Red Clay (CTI Records 40th Anniversary Edition - Original recording remastered) → Red Clay

rules.name: Remove Remastered Bonus Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [Remastered (Bonus Version)]'
examples: Brushfire Fairytales [Remastered (Bonus Version)] → Brushfire Fairytales

rules.name: Remove OJC Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (OJC Remaster)' for Original Jazz Classics releases
examples: Jazz Impressions Of Black Orpheus (OJC Remaster) → Jazz Impressions Of Black Orpheus

rules.name: Remove Gould Remaster Reference
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (1981 Gould Remaster)' for classical music
examples: Bach: The Goldberg Variations, BWV 988 (1981 Gould Remaster) → Bach: The Goldberg Variations, BWV 988

rules.name: Remove Anniversary Remaster Suffix
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (20th Anniversary Remaster)'
examples: Oh, Inverted World (20th Anniversary Remaster) → Oh, Inverted World

rules.name: Remove Digitally Remastered Parenthetical
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Digitally Remastered)'
examples: Elvis Restored (Digitally Remastered) → Elvis Restored

rules.name: Remove Deluxe Edition (MB-confirmed)
rules.description: Removes '(Deluxe Edition)' from album names only when MusicBrainz confirms the track exists on the original non-deluxe release
examples: XO (Deluxe Edition) → XO

rules.name: Remove Remastered Original Album Mix
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Remastered Original Album)'
examples: Daydream Nation (Remastered Original Album) → Daydream Nation

rules.name: Remove Deluxe Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Deluxe Edition)' or 'Album [Deluxe Edition]'
examples: XO (Deluxe Edition) → XO
Endtroducing (Deluxe Edition) → Endtroducing
By the Way (Deluxe Edition) → By the Way
The Fame Monster (Deluxe Edition) → The Fame Monster

rules.name: Remove Anniversary Deluxe Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (10th Anniversary Edition / Deluxe Edition)'
examples: Sublime (10th Anniversary Edition / Deluxe Edition) → Sublime
Songs in A Minor (10th Anniversary Edition) (Deluxe Edition) → Songs in A Minor

rules.name: Remove Anniversary Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (50th Anniversary Edition)' or 'Album: 10th Anniversary Edition'
examples: Harvest (50th Anniversary Edition) → Harvest
Songs About Jane: 10th Anniversary Edition → Songs About Jane
The Velvet Underground & Nico 45th Anniversary → The Velvet Underground & Nico

rules.name: Remove Super Deluxe Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Super Deluxe Edition)'
examples: Nevermind (Super Deluxe Edition) → Nevermind
Come Away With Me (Super Deluxe Edition) → Come Away With Me
Songs From The Big Chair (Super Deluxe Edition) → Songs From The Big Chair

rules.name: Remove Expanded Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Expanded Edition)' or 'Album [Expanded & Remastered]'
examples: Learning to Crawl (Expanded & Remastered) → Learning to Crawl
Get Close (Expanded & Remastered) → Get Close

rules.name: Remove Legacy Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Legacy Edition)'
examples: Grace (Legacy Edition) → Grace

rules.name: Remove Special Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Special Edition)' or 'Album - Special 2 CD Set'
examples: Sublime (Special Edition) → Sublime
Album - Special 2 CD Set → Album

rules.name: Remove Bonus Track Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Bonus Track Version)' or 'Album - bonus track version'
examples: Album (Bonus Track Version) → Album
Sublime - bonus track version → Sublime

rules.name: Remove Edition Suffix
rules.description: Removes generic edition patterns like 'Album (Edition)' or 'Album [Edition]'
examples: Album (Edited Edition) → Album
Album [Club Edition] → Album

rules.name: Remove Live Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Live Version; Deluxe Edition)' or 'Album [Live]'
examples: Waiting for Columbus (Live Version; Deluxe Edition) → Waiting for Columbus
Stop Making Sense (Deluxe Edition) [Live] → Stop Making Sense

rules.name: Remove CTI Records Anniversary Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns specific to CTI Records anniversary releases
examples: Red Clay (CTI Records 40th Anniversary Edition) → Red Clay
Concierto (CTI Records 40th Anniversary Edition - Original recording remastered) → Concierto

rules.name: Remove Original Jazz Classics Remasters
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [Original Jazz Classics Remasters]'
examples: Waltz For Debby [Original Jazz Classics Remasters] → Waltz For Debby
Jazz Impressions Of Black Orpheus [Original Jazz Classics Remasters] (OJC Remaster) → Jazz Impressions Of Black Orpheus

rules.name: Remove HD Digital Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album - HD Digital Remastered 2009'
examples: Time Out - HD Digital Remastered 2009 → Time Out

rules.name: Remove Remastered & Expanded Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [2012 Remastered & Expanded Edition]'
examples: A Charlie Brown Christmas [2012 Remastered & Expanded Edition] → A Charlie Brown Christmas

rules.name: Remove Disc Number Suffixes
rules.description: Removes disc number suffixes like 'Album (disc 2)' from special editions
examples: Sublime: 10th Anniversary Deluxe Edition (disc 2) → Sublime

rules.name: Remove The Steven Wilson Remix
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (The Steven Wilson Remix)'
examples: Songs from the Wood (40th Anniversary Edition; The Steven Wilson Remix) → Songs from the Wood

rules.name: Remove Restored Digitally Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Digitally Remastered)' or 'Album Restored (Digitally Remastered)'
examples: Elvis Restored (Digitally Remastered) → Elvis

rules.name: Remove Disney+ Special Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns from special streaming releases
examples: folklore: the long pond studio sessions (from the Disney+ special) [deluxe edition] → folklore

rules.name: Remove Octave Remastered Series
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Octave Remastered Series)'
examples: Gemini (Octave Remastered Series) → Gemini

rules.name: Remove Stax Remasters
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [Stax Remasters]'
examples: McLemore Avenue [Stax Remasters] → McLemore Avenue

rules.name: Remove Explicit Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Explicit Version)' or 'Album [Explicit Version]'
examples: The Big Picture (Explicit Version) → The Big Picture
Power In Numbers (Explicit Version) → Power In Numbers
40oz To Freedom (Explicit Version) → 40oz To Freedom

rules.name: Remove Explicit Marker
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Explicit)' or 'Album [Explicit]'
examples: Extinction Level Event: The Final World Front [Explicit] → Extinction Level Event: The Final World Front
Word Of Mouf (Explicit) → Word Of Mouf
Hell On Earth (Explicit) → Hell On Earth

rules.name: Remove Explicit Deluxe
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Explicit Deluxe)' or 'Album (Deluxe Explicit)'
examples: Take Care (Explicit Deluxe) → Take Care
Curtain Call (Deluxe Explicit) → Curtain Call

rules.name: Remove Regional Explicit Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [U.S. Explicit Version]'
examples: Watermelon, Chicken & Gritz [U.S. Explicit Version] → Watermelon, Chicken & Gritz

rules.name: Remove Package Explicit
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (New Package-Explicit)'
examples: Most Known Unknown (New Package-Explicit) → Most Known Unknown

rules.name: Remove Explicit from Track Names
rules.description: Removes explicit markers from track names
examples: Song Title (Explicit) → Song Title
Song Title [Explicit] → Song Title

rules.name: Remove Explicit Version from Track Names
rules.description: Removes explicit version markers from track names
examples: Song Title (Explicit Version) → Song Title
